quotes.quote: Originality is really important.
Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
Immature poets imitate; mature poets steal.
Anymore, no one's mind is their own.
The unique must be fulfilled.
An original artist is unable to copy. So he has only to copy in order to be original.
Always be a first rate version of yourself, instead of a second rate version of somebody else.
You were born an original. Don't die a copy.
Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for something you are not.
Insist upon yourself. Be original.
Originality is the art of concealing your sources
Originality exists in every individual because each of us differs from the others. We are all primary numbers divisible only by ourselves.
Create your own method. Don't depend slavishly on mine. Make up something that will work for you! But keep breaking traditions, I beg you.
The man with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
Originality is way overrated. To make, you need to take. All great artists do.
I think one of the reasons I'm popular again is because I'm wearing a tie. You have to be different.
Every individual has the potential to be original.
Originality comes from just being true to ourselves and what we value about what we see.
True originality consists not in a new manner but in a new vision
If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
Originality does not consist in saying what no one has ever said before, but in saying exactly what you think yourself.

Be original, be yourself. In trying to become like someone else, we are compromising our own self being. If we are not satisfied with our own self, can not find satisfaction anywhere. We should learn to keep our own self happy and remain happy under all circumstances in life. The key to being happy is a non-insisting mind, non-complaining mind, and a pure mind.
Be the one who speaks out above the crowd when everyone else follows the norms.
A man's originality is not only the most beautiful, but the best personality of his life.
